description: Google Tasks provides a simple to-do list and task management system integrated into Gmail and Google Calendar for quick and easy tracking

tools.name: GOOGLETASKS_CLEAR_TASKS
tools.description: Permanently clears all completed tasks from a specified Google Tasks list; this action is destructive and idempotent.

tasklist.title: Tasklist
tasklist.description: The identifier of the task list from which to clear completed tasks. Use '@default' for the default task list.

tools.name: GOOGLETASKS_CREATE_TASK_LIST
tools.description: Creates a new task list with the specified title.

tasklist_title.title: Tasklist Title
tasklist_title.description: Title for the new task list. The maximum allowed length is 1024 characters.

tools.name: GOOGLETASKS_DELETE_TASK
tools.description: Deletes a specified task from a given task list in Google Tasks.

task_id.title: Task Id
task_id.description: The unique identifier of the Google Task to be deleted.

tasklist_id.title: Tasklist Id
tasklist_id.description: The unique identifier of the Google Task list from which the task will be deleted.

tools.name: GOOGLETASKS_DELETE_TASK_LIST
tools.description: Permanently deletes an existing Google Task list, identified by `tasklist_id`, along with all its tasks; this operation is irreversible.

tasklist_id.title: Tasklist Id
tasklist_id.description: Unique identifier of the Google Task list to be deleted.

tools.name: GOOGLETASKS_GET_TASK
tools.description: Use to retrieve a specific Google Task if its `task_id` and parent `tasklist_id` are known.

task_id.title: Task Id
task_id.description: Unique identifier of the Google Task to retrieve.

tasklist_id.title: Tasklist Id
tasklist_id.description: Unique identifier of the Google Tasks list containing the task.

tools.name: GOOGLETASKS_GET_TASK_LIST
tools.description: Retrieves a specific task list from the user's Google Tasks if the `tasklist_id` exists for the authenticated user.

tasklist_id.title: Tasklist Id
tasklist_id.description: The unique identifier of the task list to retrieve, assigned by Google Tasks when the list is created.

tools.name: GOOGLETASKS_INSERT_TASK
tools.description: Creates a new task in a given `tasklist_id`, optionally as a subtask of an existing `task_parent` or positioned after an existing `task_previous` sibling, where both `task_parent` and `task_previous` must belong to the same `tasklist_id` if specified. IMPORTANT: Date fields (due, completed) accept various formats like '28 Sep 2025', '11:59 PM, 22 Sep 2025', or ISO format '2025-09-21T15:30:00Z' and will automatically convert them to RFC3339 format required by the API.

inputSchema.title: InsertTaskRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier for the task. Generated by Google Tasks API when creating a task. Used for updating or deleting existing tasks.

due.title: Due
due.description:
Due date for the task (optional). NOTE: Google Tasks only stores the date portion - any time provided will be normalized to midnight UTC by the API. 
Google Tasks API requires dates in RFC3339 format (e.g., 2025-09-22T13:48:27Z).
We automatically convert various human-readable formats to RFC3339:

Accepted formats:
• 2025-09-28T23:59:00Z → RFC3339/ISO-8601 format (preferred) - September 28, 2025 at 11:59 PM UTC
• 28 Sep 2025 → Simple date format - Will be converted to midnight UTC on that date
• 11:59 PM, 22 Sep 2025 → Time with date - Assumes UTC timezone if not specified
• 1:00 PM, 21 Sep 2025 → 12-hour format with date - Converted to 13:00 UTC
• UTC-5:30, 6:50 PM → With timezone offset - Converted to UTC automatically
• UTC+1, 11:59 PM, 31 Dec → Timezone with date - Next occurrence of Dec 31
• 2025-09-21T15:30:00+02:00 → RFC3339 with timezone offset

Note: If no timezone is specified, UTC is assumed. Dates without times default to midnight UTC.

etag.title: Etag
etag.description: ETag of the resource for concurrency control. Prevents accidental overwrites when multiple clients modify the same task. Auto-generated by the API.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Additional details or description for the task. Supports plain text only (no HTML/markdown). Maximum 8192 characters. Example: 'Include Q3 sales data and projections'

title.title: Title
title.description: Title/name of the task (REQUIRED). This is the main text displayed for the task. Maximum 1024 characters. Example: 'Complete quarterly report'

hidden.title: Hidden
hidden.description: Whether the task is hidden from the default view. Hidden tasks can still be accessed via API but won't show in UI. Default: false

status.title: Status
status.description: Current status of the task (REQUIRED). Must be either 'needsAction' (task is pending) or 'completed' (task is done). Default: 'needsAction'

deleted.title: Deleted
deleted.description: Whether the task has been deleted. Deleted tasks are marked but not immediately removed, allowing for recovery. Default: false

completed.title: Completed
completed.description:
Date/time when the task was marked as completed. Only applicable when status='completed'. Unlike 'due', this field preserves the time component. 
Google Tasks API requires dates in RFC3339 format (e.g., 2025-09-22T13:48:27Z).
We automatically convert various human-readable formats to RFC3339:

Accepted formats:
• 2025-09-28T23:59:00Z → RFC3339/ISO-8601 format (preferred) - September 28, 2025 at 11:59 PM UTC
• 28 Sep 2025 → Simple date format - Will be converted to midnight UTC on that date
• 11:59 PM, 22 Sep 2025 → Time with date - Assumes UTC timezone if not specified
• 1:00 PM, 21 Sep 2025 → 12-hour format with date - Converted to 13:00 UTC
• UTC-5:30, 6:50 PM → With timezone offset - Converted to UTC automatically
• UTC+1, 11:59 PM, 31 Dec → Timezone with date - Next occurrence of Dec 31
• 2025-09-21T15:30:00+02:00 → RFC3339 with timezone offset

Note: If no timezone is specified, UTC is assumed. Dates without times default to midnight UTC.

task_parent.title: Task Parent
task_parent.description: Identifier of an existing task to serve as parent; if provided, creates a subtask, otherwise a top-level task in the specified list.

tasklist_id.title: Tasklist Id
tasklist_id.description: Identifier for the Google Task list where the new task will be created. Use actual task list IDs, not '@default'. You can get list IDs using 'List Task Lists' action.

task_previous.title: Task Previous
task_previous.description: Identifier of an existing task after which the new task will be placed, at the same hierarchical level (as a sibling).

inputSchema.description:
Defines the request for creating a new task. Inherits common task properties
(e.g., title, notes, due date) from `TaskInput` and adds specific parameters
for task placement within a Google Tasks list.

tools.name: GOOGLETASKS_LIST_TASK_LISTS
tools.description: Fetches the authenticated user's task lists from Google Tasks; results may be paginated.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Token for the page of results to return; omit for the first page, use `nextPageToken` from a previous response for subsequent pages.

maxResults.title: Max Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of task lists to return per page.

tools.name: GOOGLETASKS_LIST_TASKS
tools.description: Retrieves tasks from a Google Tasks list; all date/time strings must be RFC3339 UTC, and `showCompleted` must be true if `completedMin` or `completedMax` are specified.

dueMax.title: Due Max
dueMax.description:
Exclude tasks due after this date. 
Google Tasks API requires dates in RFC3339 format (e.g., 2025-09-22T13:48:27Z).
We automatically convert various human-readable formats to RFC3339:

Accepted formats:
• 2025-09-28T23:59:00Z → RFC3339/ISO-8601 format (preferred) - September 28, 2025 at 11:59 PM UTC
• 28 Sep 2025 → Simple date format - Will be converted to midnight UTC on that date
• 11:59 PM, 22 Sep 2025 → Time with date - Assumes UTC timezone if not specified
• 1:00 PM, 21 Sep 2025 → 12-hour format with date - Converted to 13:00 UTC
• UTC-5:30, 6:50 PM → With timezone offset - Converted to UTC automatically
• UTC+1, 11:59 PM, 31 Dec → Timezone with date - Next occurrence of Dec 31
• 2025-09-21T15:30:00+02:00 → RFC3339 with timezone offset

Note: If no timezone is specified, UTC is assumed. Dates without times default to midnight UTC.

dueMin.title: Due Min
dueMin.description:
Exclude tasks due before this date. 
Google Tasks API requires dates in RFC3339 format (e.g., 2025-09-22T13:48:27Z).
We automatically convert various human-readable formats to RFC3339:

Accepted formats:
• 2025-09-28T23:59:00Z → RFC3339/ISO-8601 format (preferred) - September 28, 2025 at 11:59 PM UTC
• 28 Sep 2025 → Simple date format - Will be converted to midnight UTC on that date
• 11:59 PM, 22 Sep 2025 → Time with date - Assumes UTC timezone if not specified
• 1:00 PM, 21 Sep 2025 → 12-hour format with date - Converted to 13:00 UTC
• UTC-5:30, 6:50 PM → With timezone offset - Converted to UTC automatically
• UTC+1, 11:59 PM, 31 Dec → Timezone with date - Next occurrence of Dec 31
• 2025-09-21T15:30:00+02:00 → RFC3339 with timezone offset

Note: If no timezone is specified, UTC is assumed. Dates without times default to midnight UTC.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Token from a previous list operation for fetching a specific page; if omitted, retrieves the first page.

maxResults.title: Max Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of tasks to return. API default: 20, maximum: 100.

showHidden.title: Show Hidden
showHidden.description: Include hidden tasks. Defaults to false.

updatedMin.title: Updated Min
updatedMin.description:
Lower bound for task's last modification time (for syncing). 
Google Tasks API requires dates in RFC3339 format (e.g., 2025-09-22T13:48:27Z).
We automatically convert various human-readable formats to RFC3339:

Accepted formats:
• 2025-09-28T23:59:00Z → RFC3339/ISO-8601 format (preferred) - September 28, 2025 at 11:59 PM UTC
• 28 Sep 2025 → Simple date format - Will be converted to midnight UTC on that date
• 11:59 PM, 22 Sep 2025 → Time with date - Assumes UTC timezone if not specified
• 1:00 PM, 21 Sep 2025 → 12-hour format with date - Converted to 13:00 UTC
• UTC-5:30, 6:50 PM → With timezone offset - Converted to UTC automatically
• UTC+1, 11:59 PM, 31 Dec → Timezone with date - Next occurrence of Dec 31
• 2025-09-21T15:30:00+02:00 → RFC3339 with timezone offset

Note: If no timezone is specified, UTC is assumed. Dates without times default to midnight UTC.

showDeleted.title: Show Deleted
showDeleted.description: Include deleted tasks. Defaults to false.

tasklist_id.title: Tasklist Id
tasklist_id.description: Identifier of the task list. Use '@default' for the user's primary task list.

completedMax.title: Completed Max
completedMax.description:
Exclude tasks completed after this date. 
Google Tasks API requires dates in RFC3339 format (e.g., 2025-09-22T13:48:27Z).
We automatically convert various human-readable formats to RFC3339:

Accepted formats:
• 2025-09-28T23:59:00Z → RFC3339/ISO-8601 format (preferred) - September 28, 2025 at 11:59 PM UTC
• 28 Sep 2025 → Simple date format - Will be converted to midnight UTC on that date
• 11:59 PM, 22 Sep 2025 → Time with date - Assumes UTC timezone if not specified
• 1:00 PM, 21 Sep 2025 → 12-hour format with date - Converted to 13:00 UTC
• UTC-5:30, 6:50 PM → With timezone offset - Converted to UTC automatically
• UTC+1, 11:59 PM, 31 Dec → Timezone with date - Next occurrence of Dec 31
• 2025-09-21T15:30:00+02:00 → RFC3339 with timezone offset

Note: If no timezone is specified, UTC is assumed. Dates without times default to midnight UTC.

completedMin.title: Completed Min
completedMin.description:
Exclude tasks completed before this date. 
Google Tasks API requires dates in RFC3339 format (e.g., 2025-09-22T13:48:27Z).
We automatically convert various human-readable formats to RFC3339:

Accepted formats:
• 2025-09-28T23:59:00Z → RFC3339/ISO-8601 format (preferred) - September 28, 2025 at 11:59 PM UTC
• 28 Sep 2025 → Simple date format - Will be converted to midnight UTC on that date
• 11:59 PM, 22 Sep 2025 → Time with date - Assumes UTC timezone if not specified
• 1:00 PM, 21 Sep 2025 → 12-hour format with date - Converted to 13:00 UTC
• UTC-5:30, 6:50 PM → With timezone offset - Converted to UTC automatically
• UTC+1, 11:59 PM, 31 Dec → Timezone with date - Next occurrence of Dec 31
• 2025-09-21T15:30:00+02:00 → RFC3339 with timezone offset

Note: If no timezone is specified, UTC is assumed. Dates without times default to midnight UTC.

showCompleted.title: Show Completed
showCompleted.description: Include completed tasks. Defaults to true. (See action docstring for interaction with `completedMin`/`Max`).

tools.name: GOOGLETASKS_MOVE_TASK
tools.description: Moves the specified task to another position in the destination task list.

parent.title: Parent
parent.description: New parent task identifier. If not provided, the task is moved to the top level.

previous.title: Previous
previous.description: New previous sibling task identifier. If not provided, the task is moved to the first position among its siblings.

destinationTasklist.title: Destination Tasklist
destinationTasklist.description: Destination task list identifier. If set, the task is moved to this list; otherwise, it remains in its current list.

tools.name: GOOGLETASKS_PATCH_TASK
tools.description: Partially updates an existing task (identified by `task_id`) within a specific Google Task list (identified by `tasklist_id`), modifying only the provided attributes from `TaskInput` (e.g., `title`, `notes`, `due` date, `status`) and requiring both the task and list to exist.

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier for the task. Generated by Google Tasks API when creating a task. Used for updating or deleting existing tasks.

due.title: Due
due.description:
Due date for the task (optional). NOTE: Google Tasks only stores the date portion - any time provided will be normalized to midnight UTC by the API. 
Google Tasks API requires dates in RFC3339 format (e.g., 2025-09-22T13:48:27Z).
We automatically convert various human-readable formats to RFC3339:

Accepted formats:
• 2025-09-28T23:59:00Z → RFC3339/ISO-8601 format (preferred) - September 28, 2025 at 11:59 PM UTC
• 28 Sep 2025 → Simple date format - Will be converted to midnight UTC on that date
• 11:59 PM, 22 Sep 2025 → Time with date - Assumes UTC timezone if not specified
• 1:00 PM, 21 Sep 2025 → 12-hour format with date - Converted to 13:00 UTC
• UTC-5:30, 6:50 PM → With timezone offset - Converted to UTC automatically
• UTC+1, 11:59 PM, 31 Dec → Timezone with date - Next occurrence of Dec 31
• 2025-09-21T15:30:00+02:00 → RFC3339 with timezone offset

Note: If no timezone is specified, UTC is assumed. Dates without times default to midnight UTC.

etag.title: Etag
etag.description: ETag of the resource for concurrency control. Prevents accidental overwrites when multiple clients modify the same task. Auto-generated by the API.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Additional details or description for the task. Supports plain text only (no HTML/markdown). Maximum 8192 characters. Example: 'Include Q3 sales data and projections'

title.title: Title
title.description: Title/name of the task (REQUIRED). This is the main text displayed for the task. Maximum 1024 characters. Example: 'Complete quarterly report'

hidden.title: Hidden
hidden.description: Whether the task is hidden from the default view. Hidden tasks can still be accessed via API but won't show in UI. Default: false

status.title: Status
status.description: Current status of the task (REQUIRED). Must be either 'needsAction' (task is pending) or 'completed' (task is done). Default: 'needsAction'

deleted.title: Deleted
deleted.description: Whether the task has been deleted. Deleted tasks are marked but not immediately removed, allowing for recovery. Default: false

task_id.title: Task Id
task_id.description: Identifier of the Google Task to be updated within the specified task list.

completed.title: Completed
completed.description:
Date/time when the task was marked as completed. Only applicable when status='completed'. Unlike 'due', this field preserves the time component. 
Google Tasks API requires dates in RFC3339 format (e.g., 2025-09-22T13:48:27Z).
We automatically convert various human-readable formats to RFC3339:

Accepted formats:
• 2025-09-28T23:59:00Z → RFC3339/ISO-8601 format (preferred) - September 28, 2025 at 11:59 PM UTC
• 28 Sep 2025 → Simple date format - Will be converted to midnight UTC on that date
• 11:59 PM, 22 Sep 2025 → Time with date - Assumes UTC timezone if not specified
• 1:00 PM, 21 Sep 2025 → 12-hour format with date - Converted to 13:00 UTC
• UTC-5:30, 6:50 PM → With timezone offset - Converted to UTC automatically
• UTC+1, 11:59 PM, 31 Dec → Timezone with date - Next occurrence of Dec 31
• 2025-09-21T15:30:00+02:00 → RFC3339 with timezone offset

Note: If no timezone is specified, UTC is assumed. Dates without times default to midnight UTC.

tasklist_id.title: Tasklist Id
tasklist_id.description: Identifier of the Google Task list that contains the task to be updated.

tools.name: GOOGLETASKS_PATCH_TASK_LIST
tools.description: Updates the title of an existing Google Tasks task list.

tasklist_id.title: Tasklist Id
tasklist_id.description: The unique identifier of the task list to be updated.

updated_title.title: Updated Title
updated_title.description: The new title for the task list.

due.title: Due
due.description: Due date of the task (RFC 3339 timestamp).

tools.name: GOOGLETASKS_UPDATE_TASK_LIST
tools.description: Updates the authenticated user's specified task list.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title of the task list. Maximum length allowed: 1024 characters.
